root.name: Rockman EXE Operate Shooting Star
root.description: Overview Rockman EXE Operate Shooting Star is a DS port of the original Mega Man Battle Network. Much is the game is unchanged, including graphics (for the most part), audio, and general gameplay structure, but there are some new features, the biggest of which is the ability to play as the Mega Man from the Star Force series. Â Battle System ChangesThe BattleChip and Folder systems are taken from Battle Network 2: ten chip maximum at the Custom Screen, only five copies of a chip per folder, *-coded BattleChips are included. However, some mechanics from BN1 are carried over, including the ADD system and time-freezing Recovery chips. Geo Stelar and Omega-Xis are playable. The lock-on ability, shield, and auto-charging/rapid firing buster are retained from Star Force. Their MegaBuster is weaker than that of MegaMan.EXE's, however.New chips based on Star Force Mega Man and Omega-Xis are added.Armor System is removed.Running with the L-Button is added.Other ChangesThe bottom screen functions as a PET, much like in Mega Man Battle Network 5 DS. A scenario is added involving new Navi ClockMan.EXE.The Sky High Coliseum from Star Force 2 returns as the "Rockman Star Coliseum."
